DOC.brief_summary: Study evaluate pharmacokinetic Mass Balance single dose [ 14C ] AZD9291 healthy male volunteer
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluating Pharmacokinetic Mass Balance Single Dose 14C AZD9291 Volunteers
DOC.detailed_description: A Single-centre , Non-Randomised , Open-label , Pharmacokinetic Mass Balance Study Orally Administered [ 14C ] -AZD9291 Healthy Male Volunteers
DOC.criteria: 1 , Volunteers must willing use reliable method contraception ( condom spermicide ) , even partner postmenopausal , surgically sterile , use effective hormonal method contraception intrauterine coil . 2 . In addition , volunteer must agree continue take similar contraceptive precaution 6 month last administration AZD9291 avoid procreative sex well sperm donation 6 month . 1 , Any clinically relevant abnormality physical examination , vital sign , hematology , clinical chemistry , urinalysis ECG baseline opinion investigator . 2 . Radiation exposure clinical study , include present study , exclude background radiation include diagnostic Xrays medical exposure , exceed 5 mSv last 12 month 10 mSv last 5 year .
DOC.keyword: Phase I , healthy , pharmacokinetics , Mass balance
